languages.text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.
languages.original_text: Каждая атака этим оружием понижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} цели на 4, даже при {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или парировании.

traits.locale_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or dodged.

Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

languages.text: Каждая атака этим оружием понижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} цели на 4, даже при {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} или парировании.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждая атака этим оружием понижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} цели на 4, даже при уклонении или парировании.

Каждая атака этим оружием понижает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} цели на 4, даже при уклонении или парировании.

languages.text: 使用此武器攻击敌人时，会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}降低4点。即便此次攻击被招架或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，此效果也依然生效。
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用此武器攻击敌人时，会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}降低4点。即便此次攻击被招架或闪避，此效果也依然生效。

languages.text: この武器による攻撃のたびに、受け流したり{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}したとしても、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}を4減少させる。
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この武器による攻撃の度、受け流したり回避したとしても、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}−4

languages.text: Cada ataque atestado con esta arma reduce −4 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del objetivo, aunque se pare o {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada ataque atestado con esta arma reduce −4 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del objetivo, aunque se pare o esquive.

languages.text: Jeder Angriff mit dieser Waffe reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Ziels um −4, auch wenn pariert oder {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} wurde.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Angriff mit dieser Waffe reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Ziels um −4, auch wenn pariert oder ausgewichen wurde.

languages.text: Chaque attaque portée à l'aide de cette arme réduit de −4 l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de la cible, même en cas de parade ou d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque attaque portée à l'aide de cette arme réduit de -4 l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de la cible, même en cas de parade ou d'esquive.
